mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news ( news_date, title, content, label, release_flag, update_date ) VALUES ( #{newsDate}, #{title}, #{content}, #{label}, #{releaseFlag}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET news_date = #{newsDate}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, label = #{label}, release_flag = #{releaseFlag}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
